content: i used leftovers from previous works kidsilk mohair is doubled you ll need 10 different colors and a 10-faced dice cuff-down heel flap and kitchener stitch to graft the toe pattern is in rib2/2 and st st on the sole le istruzioni sono in inglese ma l idea del calzino è spiegata qui in italiano https //theknittingplanet blogspot com/2025/11/d-10-il-calzino-randomico html
